title.narrative: MW-0000172 Starschool Progr. 2016-2019

description.narrative: The STER school program has had an initial pilot phase of 2013-2015 in 7 schools. During this second phase we want to scale up the program to 18 schools in the 3 regions. This will reach 20,000 children, 280 teachers, and 520 members of parent councils and mother groups. In addition, we also indirectly reach traditional and religious community leaders, the local government, and the Ministry of Education at local, regional and national level. further scaling up to 30 schools in 4 regions for 2017. 27000 students involved 90 teachers, 159 head teachers and 900 members of SMC PTA and mother groups.

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of basic education schools (primary and secondary education) that conduct EDU-Q Card assessment and make a school development plan based on scores (so called STAR schools).
